title: Super-Fruity Carrot Cake
ingredients: ['315g plain flour', '300g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '3 eggs', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '25g desiccated coconut', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '80g sultanas', '1/2 (432g) tin crushed pineapple', '85g walnuts or almonds (optional)', '3 medium bananas, mashed', '225g grated carrots', '150ml oil']
